events.name: eds-tree-node-selected
events.description:
fired when a node in tree has been selected.  The node is
passed as an event parameter.

properties.name: selectedNodes
properties.description:
Array of all nodes currently selected. This is provided as a readonly
property and should not be set

properties.name: useIcons
properties.description: Defines if secondary icons are used

methods.name: collapseAllNodes
methods.description: Collapse all nodes that have children

methods.name: expandAllNodes
methods.description: Expands all nodes that have children

methods.name: selectItem
methods.description: Selects a specific node in the tree as well as expanding each parent to reach this node

EDSTree.description: The **tree navigation** component provides an expandable and selectable tree of navigation options. The contents are controlled primarily through a structured object of branch and leaf nodes.
EDSTree.name: Tree Navigation
EDSTree.usage:
The Tree component expects to receive the `nodes` attribute as input
which is an array of objects with the following minimal structure:
```javascript
    [{
         name: string;
         children: Array<object>;  // optional
         meta: string;             // optional
    }]
  ```

Each node object requires a `name` which is rendered.
Any node without `children` property will be considered
a leaf node.  Any array of objects of the same form as `children` will
be rendered as a tree hierarchy.  The `meta` property can
be optionally specified to provide search terms to interoperate
with the `eds-search` component.  In addition, users can
add any other property to the object to suite their needs.
Each time a node is selected in the tree, the `eds-tree-node-selected`
event will be fired with the selected node passed in the event.

The following css variables are available for styling :

CSS Variable | Description
:----------------|:-------------
--eds-tree-menu-text-color | Text color for tree menu
--eds-tree-menu-text-color-hover | Text hover color for tree menu
--eds-tree-menu-border-color | Border Color for tree menu
--eds-tree-menu-border-color-focus | Focus state for a tree item
--eds-tree-menu-text-color-disabled | Text color for a disabled tree item
--eds-tree-selected-color | Text Color for a selected tree item

events.name: eds-tree-node-selected
events.description:
fired when a node in tree has been selected.  The node is
passed as an event parameter.
